hotels.name: Labadi Beach Hotel
hotels.desc: Beachfront hotel with direct sand access, swimming pool, family rooms, water sports facilities
hotels.longDesc: Right on Labadi Beach, this hotel offers direct beach access and family-friendly amenities perfect for coastal relaxation and water activities with children.
hotels.address: Number one, La Rd, Accra, Ghana

hotels.name: Airbnb home with car and driver package
hotels.desc: Modern apartment accommodations, spacious layouts, kitchen facilities, family-oriented neighborhood
hotels.longDesc: Comfortable self-catering apartments in trendy East Legon offer families flexibility and space for cooking meals and relaxing away from hotels.
hotels.photoAttribution: Airbnb home with car and driver package

hotels.name: Busua Beach Resort
hotels.desc: Seaside resort with beachfront cabins, adventure activities, laid-back atmosphere, sunset views
hotels.longDesc: This Western Region gem offers beachfront bungalows and a relaxed vibe perfect for families seeking adventure and coastal beauty away from city crowds.

hotels.name: Movenpick Ambassador Hotel Accra
hotels.desc: Luxury five-star hotel, multiple pools, fine dining restaurants, spa, excellent family amenities
hotels.longDesc: Premium accommodation with world-class facilities, including multiple pools and kids' activities, ensuring a comfortable stay for families seeking luxury.
hotels.address: Ridge, Pmb Ct 343, Independence Ave, Accra, Ghana

hotels.name: Coconut Grove Beach Resort
hotels.desc: Family-friendly beachfront resort with pool and spacious rooms in Elmina

restaurants.name: The Buka Restaurant, Osu, Accra
restaurants.desc: Pan-African fine dining, contemporary cuisine, outdoor terrace, sophisticated ambiance, local ingredients
restaurants.longDesc: Award-winning Pan-African restaurant showcasing modern interpretations of regional cuisines in an elegant setting perfect for family celebrations.

restaurants.name: Waakye At Dawn, Madina
restaurants.desc: Popular local waakye spot, traditional Ghanaian rice and beans, affordable, authentic street food vibe
restaurants.longDesc: Beloved street food establishment serving iconic waakye with plantains, a budget-friendly introduction to authentic Ghanaian breakfast culture for families.

restaurants.name: Twisted Lime Restaurant & Bar
restaurants.desc: Contemporary restaurant, fusion cuisine, rooftop bar views, evening ambiance, craft cocktails
restaurants.longDesc: Trendy rooftop venue combining modern cuisine with city views, offering evening dining and cocktails while families enjoy a sophisticated atmosphere.
restaurants.address: 710 S U.S. 1, Vero Beach, FL 32962, USA

restaurants.name: Papaye Fast Food (Oxford Street)
restaurants.desc: Cozy caf√©, fresh pastries, excellent coffee, relaxed atmosphere, breakfast and brunch spot
restaurants.longDesc: Charming neighborhood caf√© perfect for family breakfasts with fresh pastries, quality coffee, and a welcoming environment for parents and kids alike.

restaurants.name: DE BABS KITCHEN & PUB
restaurants.desc: Popular lunch spot in Osu serving contemporary Ghanaian and international cuisine
restaurants.photoAttribution: De Bab's Pub. Bertter Meals' Restaurant. Hi Cee....Cynthia.

restaurants.name: Chez Clarisse Mama Africa
restaurants.desc: French-Ivorian restaurant in Airport Residential Area with elegant atmosphere

restaurants.name: Asanka Local International Chop Bar
restaurants.desc: Contemporary Ghanaian restaurant in Osu known for local dishes with modern presentation

restaurants.name: Azmera Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Popular spot for authentic Ghanaian dishes with outdoor seating near Osu
restaurants.address: 9 Sir. Arku Korsah Rd, Accra, Ghana

restaurants.name: Elmina - Java Museum
restaurants.desc: Charming cafe with local dishes and historical artifacts in Elmina
restaurants.address: 61/21 Cape Coast - Takoradi Rd, Elmina, Ghana

restaurants.name: Ko-Sa Beach Resort
restaurants.desc: Beachfront seafood restaurant with fresh catches and local flavors
restaurants.address: Beach Road 1 Central Region Ampenyi, Ghana

restaurants.name: Castle Beach Resturant
restaurants.desc: Casual spot near the castle with local Ghanaian plates

restaurants.name: Fishermans Cottage
restaurants.desc: Seaside dining with grilled fish and traditional Ghanaian dishes

restaurants.name: Sky Bar 25 Restaurant and Bar
restaurants.desc: Rooftop restaurant at Movenpick with panoramic city views and international cuisine
restaurants.address: N 16 N Airport Rd, Accra, Ghana

experiences.name: Ghana
experiences.desc: West African cuisine, jollof rice tradition, vibrant food culture
experiences.longDesc: Ghana's culinary scene is defined by iconic dishes like jollof rice, representing West African food traditions and vibrant local flavors celebrated across the region.

experiences.name: Cape Coast Castle
experiences.desc: Historic colonial castle, UNESCO site, guided tours, dungeons, museum, educational cultural importance
experiences.longDesc: This UNESCO-listed castle offers poignant historical tours that educate families about Ghana's heritage while providing insight into West African history.

experiences.name: Kakum National Park
experiences.desc: Protected rainforest, canopy walkway suspension bridge, wildlife viewing, hiking trails, nature reserve
experiences.longDesc: Thrilling canopy walkway suspended 40 meters above rainforest floor offers families adventure and incredible bird-watching opportunities in pristine natural surroundings.

experiences.name: Nzulezo - The Village on Stilts
experiences.desc: Unique stilt village, canoe tours, cultural immersion, traditional dwellings, waterway exploration, authentic experience
experiences.longDesc: Fascinating floating village built entirely on stilts where families can explore traditional Nzema culture by canoe, creating unforgettable authentic memories.

experiences.name: Mole National Park
experiences.desc: Large wildlife park, safari game drives, diverse animals, guided tours, accommodation, northern adventure
experiences.longDesc: Ghana's premier safari destination where families can spot elephants, antelopes, and diverse wildlife while experiencing Northern Region savanna ecosystems.

experiences.name: Elmina Beach Resort
experiences.desc: Beachfront resort with public beach access and sunset viewing area in Elmina

experiences.name: Oasis Beach Resort
experiences.desc: Local beach in Cape Coast, adjacent to the castle, popular spot for relaxation and local atmosphere
experiences.address: Emintsimadze Drive, 42 Victoria Park, Cape Coast, Ghana

kidFriendly.name: Labadi Beach
kidFriendly.desc: Popular urban beach, lifeguards, water activities, beach volleyball, colorful fishing boats, family atmosphere
kidFriendly.longDesc: Vibrant urban beach perfect for families with calm waters, lifeguards, and lively atmosphere featuring local vendors, games, and safe swimming areas.

markets.name: Mokola Market
markets.desc: Central market, fresh produce, local goods, vibrant atmosphere, authentic shopping experience, cultural immersion
markets.longDesc: Bustling traditional market offering fresh local produce, handcrafted goods, and authentic glimpses of daily Ghanaian commerce that families find culturally enriching.
markets.address: a20 Kojo Thompson Rd, Accra, Ghana

a.name: Ghana Family Discovery: Beaches, Castles & Canopy Walks (8 Days)
a.description: A perfectly paced journey through coastal Ghana blending beachfront relaxation, historic castle explorations, rainforest adventures, and authentic cultural experiences designed for young adventurers.
